title: Canadian Gun Sales Spike Amid Fears Of COVID-19, Tougher Firearms Laws - HuffPost Canada

content: TORONTO The COVID outbreak coupled with fears about more restrictive gun legislation has fuelled a spike in firearm and ammunition sales several dealers said this week Buyers they say are stocking up while they can a development that has alarmed gun c chars
